title: nbdev school
text:
Create Studentâ€™s instance and call introduce method.

Student("Tom", 14).introduce()

Hello, I'm Tom and 14-years old.

title: Student
text:
usage

students = [
    Student("Tom", 14),
    Student("Jack", 15)
]

for student in students:
    student.introduce()

Hello, I'm Tom and 14-years old.
Hello, I'm Jack and 15-years old.
